name: Cientis Technologies
overview:
Cientis Technologies is an international developer of web-based tools to assist clinicians and their medical practice teams in the selection, adoption, and use of Electronic Health Records systems and related healthcare technologies. The Cientis Technologies platform helps clinicians improve care and enhance efficiency through education on the effective use of health information technology.

In 2005, Cientis Technologies launched CanadianEMR. CanadianEMR.ca has grown to become one of the most comprehensive resources in Canada devoted to assisting physicians with selection, adoption, and use of Electronic Medical Records.

On July 13, 2010, Cientis Technologies in conjunction with the American College of Physicians launched AmericanEHR Partners, a new, free interactive website to help U.S. medical practices compare, select, and implement electronic health records (EHRs).

AmericanEHR currently has 13,000+ clinician members representing more than 280,000 full time physicians in their medical practices.
